languages.text: "Во имя Его, во славу жертвы Его и в почтении к наставлениям Его..." {n}Арджента цедит молитву сквозь зубы, бессильно сжимая кулаки.{/n} "Клянусь, Комморра умоется кровью и захлебнется в ней... клянусь..."

"Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."
languages.original_text: "Во имя Его, во славу жертвы Его и в почтении к наставлениям Его..." {n}Арджента цедит молитву сквозь зубы, бессильно сжимая кулаки.{/n} "Клянусь, Комморра умоется кровью и захлебнется в ней... клянусь..."

traits.locale_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Que Son nom soit exalté, que Son sacrifice soit sanctifié, que Ses enseignements soient loués... » {n}Argenta marmonne une prière entre ses dents, les poings serrés.{/n} « Commorragh se noiera dans son propre sang... J'en fais le serment... »
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: « Que Son nom soit exalté, que Son sacrifice soit sanctifié, que Ses enseignements soient loués... » {n}Argenta marmonne une prière entre ses dents, les poings serrés.{/n} « Commorragh se noiera dans son propre sang... J'en fais le serment... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “以祂神圣的名义，以祂崇高的牺牲，以祂尊崇的教导……”{n}阿洁塔咬牙切齿地念着祷文，愤怒地攥紧拳头。{/n}“总有一天，科摩罗将血流成河……我发誓……”
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: “以祂神圣的名义，以祂崇高的牺牲，以祂尊崇的教导……”{n}阿洁塔咬牙切齿地念着祷文，愤怒地攥紧拳头。{/n}“总有一天，科摩罗将血流成河……我发誓……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「主の御名に崇高を、主の犠牲に神聖を、主の教えに栄誉を…」{n}アルジェンタは怒りに拳を握りしめ、歯を食いしばりながら祈りの言葉をつぶやいた。{/n}「コモラフは血に沈めます。この身に誓って…」
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: 「主の御名に崇高を、主の犠牲に神聖を、主の教えに栄誉を…」{n}アルジェンタは怒りに拳を握りしめ、歯を食いしばりながら祈りの言葉をつぶやいた。{/n}「コモラフは血に沈めます。この身に誓って…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gepriesen sei Sein Name, geheiligt sei Sein Opfer, verehrt seien Seine Lehren ..." {n}Argenta murmelt ihr Gebet durch zusammengebissene Zähne und mit vor Wut geballten Fäusten.{/n} "Commorragh wird in Blut ersaufen ... Das schwöre ich ..."
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: "Gepriesen sei Sein Name, geheiligt sei Sein Opfer, verehrt seien Seine Lehren ..." {n}Argenta murmelt ihr Gebet durch zusammengebissene Zähne und mit vor Wut geballten Fäusten.{/n} "Commorragh wird in Blut ersaufen ... Das schwöre ich ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Exaltado sea Su nombre, santificado sea Su sacrificio, veneradas sean Sus enseñanzas...». {n}Argenta musita la plegaria con los dientes apretados y los puños cerrados por la ira.{/n} «Commorragh se ahogará en sangre... Lo juro...».
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: «Exaltado sea Su nombre, santificado sea Su sacrificio, veneradas sean Sus enseñanzas...». {n}Argenta musita la plegaria con los dientes apretados y los puños cerrados por la ira.{/n} «Commorragh se ahogará en sangre... Lo juro...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "O'nun adı, görkemine kavuşsun; fedakârlığı, kutsallığını yansıtsın ve öğretileri onurlandırılsın..." {n}Dişlerini ve yumruklarını sıkmış hâldeki Argenta, bir dua mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Commorragh, kan gölüne dönecek... Şerefim üstüne yemin ederim..."
languages.original_text: "Exalted be His name, hallowed be His sacrifice, honoured be His teachings..." {n}Argenta mutters the prayer through gritted teeth, her fists clenched in anger.{/n} "Commorragh will drown in blood... I swear it..."

traits.locale_text: "O'nun adı görkemine kavuşsun, O'nun fedakârlığı kutsallığını yansıtsın ve O'nun öğretileri onurlandırılsın…" {n}Argenta; dişlerini ve yumruklarını sıkmış, bir dua mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Commorragh, kan gölüne dönecek… Şerefim üstüne yemin ederim…"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
